name: Coffee Table
description:
Epworth HomeSweetHome is a therapeutic group home for boys. Our children's coffee cum study table has caved in due to wear and tear.

For safety reasons, we are looking to replace it with a sturdy table that does not come with any storage. We prefer a rectangular-shaped table so our boys can sit around it when studying. 

Please donate only new or in good condition tables, as they are meant to last our residents for many years to come. Thank you!

contact.org: Epworth Community services - Home Sweet Home
contact.name: Tiong Poh Eng

passiton.name: Coffee table - solid wood
passiton.description: Wooden coffee table to be given away.
passiton.location: Amber Road, East Coast, Joo Chiat, Katong, Marine Parade, Meyer, Tanjong Rhu

name: Mattress
description: We are seeking a single-size mattress with bedsheet for a senior male client who is currently sleeping on the floor and often feels cold. He has cataract issues and experiences significant ambulation difficulties, with frequent falls at home occurring almost daily. Having a proper mattress would greatly improve his comfort, warmth, and safety, and help reduce the risk of further falls. Any assistance from kind donors would be deeply appreciated.

name: single bed
description: bachelor 55 years old, weigh 125 kg. needs a single bed-frame and mattress. He has completed his one year program. He is currently staying in Highpoint halfway house and is promoted to a helper. As a helper he is sourcing for a super single bed as move into the helper room. It is also because of his size and weigh.

name: TV
description: Family of 8 (parents with 6 children) requires a television to replace the current faulty one. Family has tight financial situation and unable to afford to get a replacement.

passiton.name: Tv console
passiton.description: Good condition except a small peeling (20cent coin size) and middle drawer knob loose. All is good. Long shelf life.

passiton.name: Nice tv console
passiton.description: Light brown with dark brown top tv console

name: Oven
description: Single elderly whose oven that she has used in the past 12 years has spoiled. Would like to have an oven so that she can continue cooking.

passiton.name: Cornell Oven Toaster
passiton.description: Model CT-25W. 700W. 9 litre capacity. Useful for toasting bread and reheating pastries. Top and bottom heating element. Well-used, working condition. Small dent on the back panel.

name: Diapers
description: Client has 5 children, age 5, 4, 2, 1 years old and 22 days old. Client has been unemployed since birth of first child. Husband is on unpaid leave in order to support caregiving of children since client just gave birth, hence, is unable to receive his daily pay. Family is currently pending approval for financial assistance. Family hopes for urgent support of a few tins of Abbott Similac Gain 5MO Growing-up Milk Stage 3, a few packets of Huggies Pants L and Huggies Pants XXL. Kindly contact/WhatsApp me at 98598768 for further liaison, thank you!

passiton.name: Worn Baby clothes (6-12mths), new cloth diapers

name: Wheelchair
description: We are seeking a well-functioning wheelchair for a senior female client with mobility difficulties. She currently has a wheelchair, but it is faulty and unsafe to use as the brakes and seat belt are not working properly. She requires a wheelchair with functioning brakes and a seat belt to move around safely in the community, especially as she has frequent medical appointments and depends on a wheelchair for outdoor mobility. Any support from kind donors would be greatly appreciated.

passiton.name: Bion Wheelchair
passiton.location: Bayshore, Bedok, Chai Chee, Eastwood, Kew Drive, Upper East Coast

name: Bicycle
description: Mum of three children is looking for a donated bicycle to start working as a delivery rider, to gain financial independence and provide for her three young children. Direct delivery to Commonwealth area is appreciated.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Fitrah Nabilah
